attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political Correctness should be made as serious a crime as racism and people who come up with these ideas should be locked up for a very long time to protect the rest of society from their silly ways.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
